Package main

package main
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractView
    Abstract base class for creating various view components in a graphical user interface that interact with a TablrManager instance.
    Cell<T>
    Represents a single cell in a table structure that holds a value of a generic type.
    ChangeModeListener
    The ChangeModeListener interface is used to define listeners that respond to mode change events in views implementing the AbstractView class.
    Column<T>
    Represents a column in a table structure with a generic value type.
    DesignView
     
    EditColumnCharacteristicsView
    Represents a view for editing the characteristics of a column.
    EditDefaultValueView
    A view class for editing the default value of a specific column in a table.
    EditRowView
    Represents a view for editing a specific cell value in a table.
    EditTableNameView
    Represents a view for editing the name of a table in the application.
    MyCanvasWindow
    MyCanvasWindow is a subclass of CanvasWindow used to render the Tablr GUI.
    RowsView
    RowsView is a view for displaying and interacting with rows in a specific table managed by the TablrManager.
    Table
    Represents a table object that contains a collection of columns.
    TablesView
    Represents a view for displaying and interacting with a list of tables.
    TablrApp
    TablrApp is the main entry point for the Tablr application.
    TablrManager
    TablrManager is responsible for managing a collection of tables and their corresponding operations.
    TablrManagerListener
    The TablrManagerListener interface defines contentsChanged() that is invoked by the observer.
